meanings.definition: The point on the lower jaw where the angle formed by the jawbone is most prominent.
meanings.sent1: I touched my gonion to feel the bony part of my jaw.
meanings.sent2: The dentist examined my gonion to check for any jaw issues.
meanings.sent3: When I smiled, my gonion seemed to say hello to everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her gonion jutted out like a sharp corner, giving her a defined jawline.
meanings.sent5: The boxer's gonion took the brunt of the punch, causing him pain.

meanings.definition: A geometric term referring to the point of intersection of two lines forming an angle.
meanings.sent1: The gonion of the two lines marked the meeting point on the graph.
meanings.sent2: In geometry class, we learned how to find the gonion of intersecting lines.
meanings.sent3: The gonion of the lines looked like a tiny meeting spot for them to chat.
meanings.sent4: The gonion of the angles was like a secret rendezvous point for the lines.
meanings.sent5: The gonion of the lines was where the magic of geometry happened.
